title: Whereas the Lady Wentworth gives out ... that she is ready and willing to ... go to a tryal at law, with the Lady Poole her sister, and the Countess of Newbrough, for and concerning a debt of 6000 l. due and owing to them ...
notes: Title from first six lines of text.
Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
